text.section: Except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, if a holder violates any provision of this subtitle, no holder may collect or receive any finance charge from the buyer.

section.section:
If the seller or any subsequent holder unintentionally and in good faith fails to comply with any provision of §§ 12-504 through 12-507 of this subtitle, the holder may correct the error within 10 days after:
He notices it; or
The buyer notifies him in writing of the error.
If the holder corrects the error within the 10-day period, he may not be subject to any penalty under this subtitle.
